instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Beat cake mix with eggs, oil and coffee in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Pour evenly into 2 greased (9-inch) round cake pans.
Mix brown sugar and cinnamon in medium bowl. Stir in coconut and walnuts; sprinkle evenly over cake batter.
Bake 30 min. or until toothpick inserted in centers comes out clean. Cool completely on wire racks before removing cake layers from pans.
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups brewed MAXWELL HOUSE Decaffeinated Coffee, cooled
title: Cinnamon-Crusted Coffee Cake
